description: React component for user registration in a web application, providing a registration form with username and password fields, handling form submission, and utilizing context for authentication.

methods.name: Register()
methods.description: React function component rendering a user registration form.

methods.name: handleChange
methods.description: Updates the form state when user types into input fields.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, calls the register method from context.
